member.name: T:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Providers.Configuration.ProviderConfiguration
member.summary: This class holds the configuration data for providers.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Providers.Configuration.ProviderConfiguration.GetProvider(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the named provider, if found Provider name Provider

member.name: M:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Providers.Configuration.ProviderConfiguration.GetConfig(System.String)
member.summary: Returns configuration settings for a user-defined provider configuration section.
member.returns: The provider configuration settings for sectionName.
member.exception: Thrown when no configuration is found.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Providers.Configuration.ProviderConfiguration.LoadValuesFromConfigurationXml(System.Xml.XmlNode)
member.summary: Loads values from the configuration Xml node.
member.param: The XmlNode that contains the configuration information from the configuration file. Provides direct access to the XML contents of the configuration section.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Providers.Configuration.ProviderConfiguration.GetProviders(System.Xml.XmlNode)
member.summary: Gets the provider definitions from providers node.
member.param: The XmlNode that contains the configuration information from the configuration file. Provides direct access to the XML contents of the configuration section.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Providers.Configuration.ProviderConfiguration.DefaultProvider
member.summary: The default provider name.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Providers.Configuration.ProviderConfiguration.Providers
member.summary: The collection of providers.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Providers.Configuration.Provider
member.summary: Contains information about entries in the providers section for a particular provider's configuration

member.name: M:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Providers.Configuration.Provider.#ctor(System.Xml.XmlAttributeCollection)
member.summary: Constructs the provider instance based on the collection of Xml attributes in its configuration node.
member.param: The Xml attributes of the provider defintion.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Providers.Configuration.Provider.CreateInstance(System.Object[])
member.summary: Returns an instantiated instance of the configured listener type
member.param: An array of arguments that match in number, order, and type the parameters of the constructor to invoke (can be null.)

member.name: P:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Providers.Configuration.Provider.Name
member.summary: The name of the provider defintion.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Providers.Configuration.Provider.Type
member.summary: The type name of the provider definition.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Providers.Configuration.Provider.Attributes
member.summary: The attributes of the provider definitions.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Providers.Configuration.ProviderConfigurationHandler
member.summary: This class is the configuration section handler for UII providers. It implements the IConfigurationSectionHandler interface as required by all configuration section handlers

member.name: M:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Providers.Configuration.ProviderConfigurationHandler.Create(System.Object,System.Object,System.Xml.XmlNode)
member.summary: Implements IConfigurationSectionHandler to parse the Xml node of the configuration section. The actual parsing of the Xml is delegated to ProviderConfiguration. LoadValuesFromConfigurationXml method. The returned object is added to the configuration collection and is accessed by ConfigurationSettings.GetConfig method.
member.param: The configuration settings in a corresponding parent configuration section. Not used.
An HttpConfigurationContext when Create is called from the ASP.NET configuration system. Otherwise, this parameter is reserved and is a null reference. Not used.
The XmlNode that contains the configuration information from the configuration file. Provides direct access to the XML contents of the configuration section.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Providers.ProviderBase
member.summary: The base class of all UII providers. It allows applications to work with providers in a generic manner. It forces implementation details of UII providers and it providers an efficient way to get the constructorInfo of the provider so a provider instance can be created.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Providers.ProviderBase.Initialize(System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)
member.summary: Initialize the provider's name and other properties based on the configuration values.
member.param: The collection of Xml attributes in the configuration node.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Providers.ProviderBase.GetProvider(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieve the Provider record corresponding to the specified configuration section name.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Providers.ProviderBase.Tag
member.summary: Gets or sets user-defined data associated with the object.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Providers.ProviderBase.ProviderName
member.summary: The name of the provider.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Providers.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Providers.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Providers.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Providers.Resources.PRV0100_CONFIGWEBSVC_ACCESS_ERROR
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to PRV0100: Error encountered while attempting to access the configuration web service. (Remove the "ConfigurationArea" AppSettings key to disable.).

member.name: P:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Providers.Resources.PRV0101_CONFIGWEBSRV_DESER_ERROR
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to PRV0101: Error encountered while attempting to deserialize configuration data from configuration web service..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Providers.Resources.PRV0102_INVALIDOP
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Error encountered while attempting provider configuration operation: {0}.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Providers.Resources.PRV0103_UnableToLoadProviderExceptionMessage
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to PRV0103: Unable to load provider.
